name: IMM_HM_SEQ_NUM
description: This table contains information about an immunization administration's health maintenance sequence number. The records included in this table are Problem List (LPL) records that satisfied a Health Maintenance topic for the patient.

columns.name: IMMUNE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the immunization administration record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IMM_HM_TOPIC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the health maintenance topic that is satisfied by this immunization administration.

columns.name: IMM_HM_TOPIC_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the health maintenance topic.

columns.name: IMM_HM_SEQ
columns.description: The health maintenance topic's sequence number of the immunization administration.
